trans-unit.source: Specifies the types of objects that can be retrieved from a data-store schema.
trans-unit.target: 指定可以擷取從資料存放區結構描述的物件類型。

trans-unit.source: The DesignerDataSchemaClass class is one of several types that represent the schema of a data store at design-time.
trans-unit.target: DesignerDataSchemaClass 類別是代表在設計階段資料存放區的結構描述的許多型別之一。

trans-unit.source: These schema items are made available to controls by designers implementing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment> interface.
trans-unit.target: 這些結構描述項目所實作的設計工具可提供給控制項<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: Controls access schema objects by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A> method of the interface.
trans-unit.target: 控制將結構描述物件存取藉由呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A>介面方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use fields from the DesignerDataSchemaClass class when calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDesignerDataSchema.GetSchemaItems%2A> method to specify the types of objects you want to retrieve from a data-store schema.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫時，使用來自 DesignerDataSchemaClass 類別欄位<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDesignerDataSchema.GetSchemaItems%2A>方法，以指定您想要從資料存放區結構描述中擷取的物件的類型。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDesignerDataSchema.GetSchemaItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that stored procedures should be returned from the data-store schema.
trans-unit.target: 指出應傳回從資料存放區結構描述的預存程序。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that tables should be returned from the data-store schema.
trans-unit.target: 指出應傳回從資料存放區結構描述的資料表。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that data views should be returned from the data-store schema.
trans-unit.target: 指出應傳回從資料存放區結構描述的資料檢視。
